question: Which of the following was not a promise in Queens Proclamation issued on 1st Nov 1858 as result of 1857 revolt?
option1: Equality of treatment between  Indians and Europeans
option3: Indians would be admitted to all offices of the government
option4: All the above promises were present in Queens proclamation
answer: All the above promises were present in Queens proclamation
explanation: On November 1, 1858, a grand Darbar was held at Allahabad. Here Lord Canning sent forth the royal proclamation which announced that the queen had assumed the government of India. This proclamation declared the future policy of the British Rule in India
